data.actual_result: Cursor stays in clickable link state
data.expected_result: Cursor will change back to normal cursor
data.short_description: Mouse cursor not changing state when you move the cursor from non-locked voice channel to locked channel in overlay
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord Overlay - Open a server that has locked voice channel below or above unlocked voice channel - Put the cursor to locked channel first, it will look like a normal cursor (because it's unclickable) - Move the cursor to non-locked voice channel, the cursor will change to clickable link - Move the cursor directly to the locked channel again (above or below it, without moving it anywhere else)
